posts.post_content:
First come first serve.
PM, reply, email all fine.
Prices are net to me / PayPal FF.
Add $3 for bubble mailer single card (free for multiple cards) or free shipping in a PWE.

Burns $49 (formerly PSA 3 - oversized length)
